definition: to become suddenly popular/suddenly all the rage
to flee/to scuttle/to exile or banish/to amend or edit

sentences.english: That is why suddenly Yuan Tengfei quickly became popular reasons.
sentences.chinese: 這就是袁騰飛爲什麼會突然迅速竄紅的原因。

sentences.english: Over the following years, she quickly became popular with actresses and high society.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的幾年，她在女演員和上層社會間迅速竄紅。
